forum.content:
Catching my breath, letting it go,
我已無法呼吸，讓我喘口氣
turning my cheek for the sake of this show
我必須假裝自己去面對這場鬧劇
Now that you know, this is my life,
你們要知道，這是我的人生
I won't be told what's supposed to be right
我不想讓別人告訴我，怎樣才是正確

urls.description: 'GREATEST HITS -- CHAPTER ONE' AVAILABLE NOW: http://smarturl.it/GHChapter1?iqid=ov Music video by K
urls.title: Kelly Clarkson - Catch My Breath

forum.title: Catch my breath
